00021 template <int numJoints>
00022 class MotionRequest
00023 {
00024 public:
00025     enum
00026     {
00027         e_move,
00028         e_stop,
00029         e_decelerationBecauseOfEmptyMotionQueue
00030     };
00031     
00032 public: 
00033     MotionRequest ();
00037     ~MotionRequest ();
00041     void init();
00048     int d_type;
00052     MotionId d_motionId;
00056     bool d_cartesianMode;
00061     Vector<numJoints> d_jointPosition;
00066     double d_motionTime;
00070     double d_blendingTime;
00074     bool d_useVelocityLimit;
00079     Vector<numJoints> d_jointAcceleration;
00083     Vector<numJoints> d_jointVelocityLimit;
00087     double d_speedScale;
00091     Server::ClientId d_blockedClientId;
00097     bool d_firstRequest;
00101 };
00102 
00103 
00107 template <int numJoints>
00108 MotionRequest<numJoints>::MotionRequest()
00109 {
00110     init();
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00117 template <int numJoints>
00118 void MotionRequest<numJoints>::init()
00119 {
00120     d_motionId = 0;
00121     d_cartesianMode = false;
00122     d_jointPosition = 0;
00123     d_motionTime = 1;
00124     d_blendingTime = 0.5;
00125     d_useVelocityLimit = true;
00126     d_jointVelocityLimit = 0.1;
00127     d_jointAcceleration = 0.1;
00128     d_useVelocityLimit = true;
00129     d_blockedClientId = 0;
00130     d_speedScale = 1;
00131     d_firstRequest = false;
00132 }

00141 }
